title: Centre for Administrative Data Research and Evaluation (CADRE) - an ESRC Administrative Data Research Centre
abstractText:
The linking of data is a powerful tool for researchers to extrapolate information and use as a powerful evidence base for their research. The development of a network to allow the safe access and utilisation of this linked data would have a high degree of impact on future research.

The aim of the project is to create a world-class administrative data research centre, as a constituent element of the ADRN that becomes widely known for its ability to access, link and make safe use of data for high quality research.

The objectives of the project are to develop the centre within the wider ADRN to support the research community, including governmental and other stakeholders, in realising the benefits of utilising linked data.
